item.title: In the Country with the World's Worst Displacement Crisis: Sudan (Encore)
item.description: Fighting between the Sudanese army and a paramilitary group have displaced some 12 million people in one of Africa's biggest countries. In a story we first brought you in October, our correspondent travels to Sudan and gives us a glimpse of the devastation the war has caused.

item.title: A man who killed at least 12 people in a shooting spree in Montenegro dies by suicide
item.description: A gunman who fatally shot at least 12 people, including two children, in Montenegro has killed himself while surrounded by police, officials said Thursday.
